body_html: It would be great to have this patch either as a part of the existing samples or properly in the documentation. As @rmekdma writes, most of the people do not have access to >4GB of GPU memory. Batch processing allows for running the samples of the lower range of graphic cards. Also as I see it, a lot of people have been facing the OOM issue as can be seen by the references to #136. Thanks.

body: It would be great to have this patch either as a part of the existing samples or properly in the documentation. As @rmekdma writes, most of the people do not have access to >4GB of GPU memory. Batch processing allows for running the samples of the lower range of graphic cards. Also as I see it, a lot of people have been facing the OOM issue as can be seen by the references to #136. Thanks.
